text: Sophie Vercruyssen (born 22 February 1992) is a Belgian bobsledder. She competed in the two-woman event at the 2018 Winter Olympics. She lives with her partner Lore Simons in Belgium. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian female bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Belgium Category:Bobsledders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:LGBT sportspeople from Belgium Category:Lesbian sportswomen Category:LGBT bobsledders
title: Sophie Vercruyssen
